price: Iblisi tha: “Unë jam më i mirë se ai. Mua më ke krijuar prej zjarrit, kurse atë prej balte”.
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
